raw.cmds/2023-06-06T20:21:55__certfile-check.sh certfile-check.sh New code - maximal inspector of local cert files on disk\\n - New awk core (from stackoverflow)\\n - Handles key/csr (shows modulus) to match same now shown in crt data\\n - Requires -ext option to openssl
raw.cmds/2023-06-07T11:44:49__certfile-check.sh certfile-check.sh Tweak output of SAN entries ('fmt -s' on DNS: lines)
